synopsis: Matthew, aged 13, meets a girl named Zoe with high remote control skill in the RC Park after he returned to his hometown due to his mother's job transfer. Then he breaks Zoe's record after the fist meet. Zoe is surprised by his skill, so she asks him to form a team together and brings him to the park to compete with him in the public racing track. If Matthew loses, he shall join her and enter the game for RC helicopter with her. Both are neck and neck at the beginning, but at the final round, Zoe wins.
